import React from "react"; import classes from "./ordercards.module.css"; import { Row, Col, Dropdown, DropdownButton } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function OrdersCards(props) { return (
{props.order_category} {props.order_id} {props.product_name} {props.brand} Quantity:{props.quantity} Buyer Details Action Another action Something else Payment Details Action Another action Something else Shipping Action Another action Something else {props.popularity}
); }
